DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , randomize , multicenter , parallel group , double-blind , dose-ranging , placebo-controlled evaluation analgesic efficacy , safety pharmacokinetics ketamine sublingual wafer adult subject experience post operative pain undergoing third molar extraction .
